thread.title: It’s Morphin’ Time With the PINTRILL x Power Rangers Capsule
thread.title_full: It’s Morphin’ Time With the PINTRILL x Power Rangers Capsule

author: Brian Farmer
title: It’s Morphin’ Time With the PINTRILL x Power Rangers Capsule
text:
Visit the original post to see all 7 images from this gallery. 
Following their special release for NBA All-Star Weekend , Brooklyn-based PINTRILL debuts its latest capsule in conjunction with Power Rangers .
Inspired by the popular original ‘90s TV series Might Morphin Power Rangers , this new lineup of offerings celebrate the 2017 feature film – a reboot of the Power Rangers film franchise that launched in 1995.
A number of enamels reflecting distinct elements from the franchise comprise the range — a Power Rangers Logo pin ($15), Mezagord pin ($15), Rita Repulsa pin ($15) and a Power Rangers Pink Pack – helmet, action pose, Zord, emblem ($48).
In addition, for a limited time only, 25 Power Rangers fans can customize their own Levi’s denim jacket at the Levi’s Williamsburg Brooklyn store, starting this Friday, March 24. Five jackets in each Power Rangers color will be offered and retail for a price tag of $199.
You can purchase the entire collection of pins directly at PINTRILL’s online shop and flagship location in Brooklyn, NY starting today.
Finally, select pins such as all helmet colors — red, blue, black, pink and yellow, in addition to the Green Power Ranger helmet — will be sold exclusively at Urban Outfitters soon.
Power Rangers hits theaters on Friday, March 24.
